sentences.en: Actually, the framework of Hua Youshi discipline is early too overstaffed, dismiss a half cannot cherish.

sentences.en: Many workers believe the factory is overstaffed.

sentences.en: We're overstaffed at work and I fear they're going to give me the push.

sentences.en: You can divide the work into simple part to replace the project of overstaffed.

trans.tran_en: an overstaffed company, organization etc has more workers than it needs
